intro_mixed: Hi, I'm Robby! I'll be your English teacher.
I will say a sentence, and you have to choose the best answer.
You can answer using the text box or by voice!
You must type or say the full answer.
If you want to anser by voice, just click the microphone button.
For future reference, you are a member of group number three.
intro_keyboard: Hi, I'm Robby! I'll be your English teacher.
I will say a sentence, and you have to choose the best answer.
You can answer by writing the correct response in the text box below.
You must type the full answer.
For future reference, you are a member of group number two.
intro_voice: Hi, I'm Robby! I'll be your English teacher.
I will say a sentence, and you have to choose the best answer.
You can answer by voice, just click the microphone button and speak.
You must say the full answer.
For future reference, you are a member of group number one.
